code: @Test public void verifyRestContext() {     assertThat("Rest context is incorrect!", rests, hasSize(1)).     RestDefinition rest = rests.get(0).     assertThat("Rest path is incorrect!", rest.getPath(), is(equalTo("/inbound"))). }

@Test public void sendMessageToInbound() throws InterruptedException {     outbound.expectedMessageCount(1).     outbound.expectedBodiesReceived("Response to request").     inbound.sendBody("request").     assertIsSatisfied(2L, TimeUnit.SECONDS, outbound). }
